name: Recharged!
description:
Short puzzle game about a robot who has to be 100% charged to update himself and continue to the next level. We hope you enjoy it! :DD

Sound effects from Freesound.org

Title font from 1001fonts.com

(There is a level which have a bug and don't let you continue. We didn't see it when we were checking it. I've uploaded it to drive iin case you wanted to play it completely. If not, there are some images about the levels that you can't play because of the bugged one)

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1iRZPlBDnGrAZtczetSdffAGicC2Zkq5u/view?usp=shari...
